readings.consensus_summary: Block's stunning 40% workforce cut — rewarded by surging stock prices — has turned AI-driven mass layoffs into a Wall Street playbook, while Anthropic dropped its flagship safety pledge only to be <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiggFBVV95cUxNM2FoMnc2QmtnZUZ5XzhHZkNnamg5N1psSEJndEk0RDQ5amtFLVVHYmhqVE9
